short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension that allows you to effortlessly highlight, annotate, and save your favorite text snippets from any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a Chrome extension that allows users to save and manage annotations for selected text on web pages.
